name: Unbelievabubble
description:
Sergio the Duck has to join his two friends to party but he totally forgot to bring the stuff. You’ll have to collect what is necessary to have some fun and make your path through the bubble world. But what is this strange world ? And who are the duck's friends ?

Unbelievabubble is a bubble-platformer and you’ll have to make your path by destroing bubble obstacles or use your bubble to make platforms.
